participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and sociable, George enjoys sharing stories from his past.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, Sofia has a passion for exploring new cultures and cuisines.
participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i am an art major in college.
